column2: "But, you do what you can, eh. If Digg also attacks hard, we should be able to beat them like that."
"Maybe Volcanic Caverns's not as hard as I thought. No fear! That's my new motto when it comes to Volcanic Caverns!"
"I can do this! I mean, it's not fair to let you keep racking up all the experience!"
"You'll be rooting for me, won't you? Thanks, friend!"
